forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of an afternoon shower. High 18C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally cloudy. Slight chance of an afternoon shower. High 64F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening becoming a steady rain overnight. Low near 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 63F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 65F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers likely. High 16C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers likely. High 61F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning with bright sunshine in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning with bright sunshine in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low around 10C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 51F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 52F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 53F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
